alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 1:42AM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 66.0 feet, Farm and pasturelands in the area will flood and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 47.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 70.9 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
